word.english: Did you stay up late last night?
I have to comb my hair
You'are wearing your sweater inside out
Don't forget to take out the garbage
Are you gonna to be late today?
what time are you comming home?
Have you got your lunch box?
Did you have a good time?
Can I go out to play?
Would you help me set the table?

word.chinese: 你能不能快点去趟商店？
word.english: Would you run to the store?
How soon can you get it ready?
This knife cuts well, doesn't it?
Did you wash your hands well?
It was very delicious. Thank you
I want to watch more TV
I set the alarm clock for 8:00
Wake me up at seven tomorrow
You are pretending to be asleep

word.chinese: 别把你的东西都摊在这儿

word.english: Will you take the dog for a walk?
Help me clean up the house

word.chinese: 你能帮我把衣服叠起来吗？
word.english: Would you put up the clothes to dry?

word.chinese: 你能帮我把衣服叠起来吗？
word.english: Will you help me fold up the clothes?

word.chinese: n.真空 adj.真空的 v.用吸尘器打扫
我得用吸尘器吸吸我房间了
word.english: I have to vacuum my room
I usually work out after work

word.chinese: 最近我总是丢三落四的

word.english: Do you have change for one hundred yen?

word.chinese: 我要存5000日元在我的账户上
word.english: I need to deposit 5000 yen in my saving account
I paid out of my own pocket
I can't afford to be lazy

word.chinese: 他因为还不上债而躲了起来
word.english: He didn't pay the debt and disappeared
Shall I come to pick you up?
Are you going to do anything this afternoon?

word.chinese: 我们干嘛不去看棒球比赛呢？
word.english: Why don't we go to see a baseball game?
When is it convenient for you?
That's a bad day for me
Would you like to go to a movie?
What movie do you want to see?
What time is the next showing?
What time will it be over?

word.chinese: 我们怎么坐得这么靠后呀？
word.english: We are way in the back, aren't we?

word.chinese: 我们坐到前面的座位上吧

word.english: Would you like to golf tomorrow?

word.chinese: 这附近有高尔夫球场地吗？
word.english: Are there any golf courses around here?
How much is it per person?

word.chinese: 此外还有其它的花费吗？

word.english: Please make a reservation for golf

word.chinese: 如果可以的话，请订这个星期五的

word.english: What kind of snacks should we have?

word.chinese: 就是合着录音带的音乐一起唱歌

word.english: I'd like to request a song

word.chinese: 我不敢在大家面前唱歌
word.english: I don't have the nerve to sing in front of people

word.chinese: 我跟不上新歌的速度，我不会唱新歌
word.english: I can't keep up with the new songs

word.chinese: 你唱卡拉OK有什么拿手的歌吗？

word.english: Could you send me a doctor?

word.chinese: 吃了什么不对劲的东西没有？

word.english: Are you taking any medication regularly?

word.chinese: adj.跳动的 n.跳动 v.抽痛

word.english: We are our own worst enemy
What the mind can conceive,it can achieve

word.chinese: 水（食物、饮料、药物的水含量）

word.english: How long has it been since...?

word.chinese: 好疼！好烫 n.宝石座；扣子

word.english: How long will the cast be on?
I got stung by a bee
I think he has a crush on you
I was only late by 5 minutes

word.chinese: 我还能工作好长时间呢
word.english: I can still work for a long time

word.chinese: 我太忙了，顾不上那么琐碎的事
word.english: I'm too busy to bother with such details.

word.chinese: 连喘口气的工夫都没有
word.english: I don't even have time to catch my breath

word.chinese: 换个工作是唯一的解决办法
word.english: Changing jobs is the only way out

word.chinese: 看来会议要开长时间了
word.english: It looks like it's going to be a long meeting

word.chinese: 我已经尽了最大的努力了
word.english: I did all I could do

word.chinese: 你能把要点说得再清楚点儿吗？
word.english: Would you get to the point?
Please do it all over again
Please hand the document in to me
This is a piece of work I can be proud of

word.chinese: 我找不到我的涂改液了
瞧我桌上堆了一堆的事儿
word.english: There's a lot of work piled up on my desk
I hope you don't mind my leaving now
I have no reason to be envied
He always treats me like an enemy

word.chinese: 我们很熟，互相直呼其名
word.english: We're on a first name basis
He looks older than his age
This is the way he is
He is wise for his age
You have a lot of nerve
My father's getting on in years

word.chinese: 他总把问题想得过于严重
他真是个多嘴多舌的人
他一点儿责任心也没有
word.english: He has no sense of responsbility

word.chinese: 他真是个让人讨厌的人

word.english: He's a difficult man to deal with

word.chinese: 你的香水味真够呛人的

word.english: I'm a good judge of character
I have led a dog's life

word.chinese: 请问是丹尼斯.史密斯先生吗？
我能借用一下您的电话吗？
word.english: Do you mind if I use your phone?

word.chinese: 真对不起，这么晚了还给您打电话
word.english: I'm sorry for calling you this late
I hope I didn't wake you up

word.chinese: 我有急事要找巴尔先生
word.english: It's urgent I talk to Mr.Barr now

word.chinese: 有关明天开会的事给您打电话

word.english: ABC business college, may I help you?
Who in particular would you like to talk to?
Would you mind calling back later?
I'll get your party for you

word.chinese: 您要找的人来接电话了
word.english: Your party is on the line

word.chinese: 对不起，她现在脱不开身
word.english: I'm sorry, she's tied up at the moment

word.chinese: 对不起，她正在接待客人
word.english: I'm sorry, she has company at this time
He's away from this desk now

word.chinese: 他在公司，但现在不在座位上
word.english: He's in but he's not at his desk right now
I'm sorry, he's not in right now
He should be back in ten minutes

word.chinese: 他应该下个星期来上班
word.english: He should be back in the office next week
He's on vacation until next week

word.chinese: 请告诉他林恩.凯恩给他打过电话
word.english: Would you tell him that Lynn Kane called?
How can he get a hold of you?

word.chinese: 请告诉我您的电话号码

word.english: You can reach me at 1234 until six o'clock
How do you spell your name?

word.chinese: 您开会的时候史密斯先生给你来电话了
word.english: Mr.Smith called you during the meeting

word.chinese: 我让他给您回电话好了
word.english: I'll have him call you back
I'd better get off the phone
I guess I'd better get going

word.chinese: 能跟您通上电话，我非常高兴。再见

word.english: Thank you for returning my call
I'm afraid you have the wrong number

word.chinese: 您拨的电话号码是多少？

word.english: Who would you like to talk to?

word.chinese: 这儿没有您说的这个人
word.english: There's no one here by that name

word.chinese: 我们公司没有叫鲍勃.霍普的
word.english: There's no Bob Hope in this office
I'm sorry, I must have misdialed
Please speak a little more slowly?
I can't hear you very well
I'm sorry to have kept you waiting
